official_title: To extend until January 1, 1995 the existing suspension of duty on power-driven weaving machines for weaving fabrics more than 4.9 meters in width.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 30, 1994, the duty on power-driven weaving machines for weaving fabrics more than 4.9 meters in width.

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995 the existing suspension of duty on power-driven weaving machines for weaving fabrics more than 4.9 meters in width.
